name: Robot Survival (NikaDev)
description:
A Sci-Fi  First Person Shooter Game about saving the earth from robots

The game was made in unreal engine 5 in a few weeks.

Make sure to check out the keybindings before playing

Keybinds

Z - Slow Motion

P - Pause

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Right Mouse Button - Aim
